name: Dark mode for scriptinghelpers.org (v1.1)
description:
This is nice and dark. Enjoy! Support for the forums part of the site will be coming shortly.

Also I made sure to add more contrast compared to my older dark themes because it was difficult to view some of the differences between buttons on different devices.

user.name: Fighter169mobile
user.about:
I usually make dark modes here. Used to post a lot of styles before the pandemic.

I also use userstyles.world, an improved version of this website: https://userstyles.world/user/frostynick

If anything on my dark styles is missing, send me a message. (preferably by email)

additional_info:
(7/23/2018 at 3:37 pm) v1.1:
- This now works with Lua Interpreter (scriptinghelpers.org/lua)
- The Lua Interpreter comes with 5 new style colors, making a total of 20 colors! 
- Full support in Glossary.
- Fixed an issue where the border's of hovering over players didn't turn dark.
- Blockquotes now work.
- Fixed other small issues.

(6/27/2018 at 4:18 pm) v1:
- The forums are now supported and dark!!
- Arrows for upvoting and downvoting are now visible with a background since the icons can't change color.
- A color has been added to style settings that was forgotten earlier named Light Grey.
- Fixed an issue when light blue appeared in the chat.
- Fixed a few issues when hovering over certain elements.

(6/26/2018 at 3:12 pm) v0.1:
-Style settings have been added with 14 different choices (15 in total). All colors now rely on style settings as well.
- Fixed the color in the char for when you get a 

(6/26/2018 at 1:02 pm) First update, released!

Feel free to report bugs by sending me a message, it helps improve this so thank you!

Issues I'm working on:
- Forum is not supported yet, add support to forums.
- Background on logo and notification bell is lightened in the background because it won't be visible.
